content:
Hello,
I am having problems, executing the following query on the Hapi STU3 server http://fhirtest.uhn.ca/baseDstu3/MedicationStatement?category=urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.20.77.5.3|6&effective=ge2016-11-12&_include:MedicationStatement:medication&patient=Patient/330828&status=active . The query executes just fine, when the effective date is ommited, however it returns 0 results when the effective date search parameter is used, together with the category.
